refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function implements the bottom-up stepwise optimal hierarchical clustering. The algorithm starts with every training sample being a singleton cluster, then it iteratively merges two clusters which change a certain criterion function the least, until the desired number of clusters are formed. In this routine a sum-of-squared-error criterion function is used.
